SELECT S_ID , S_NAME , S_ADD , S_TEL , ST_DELI_SERVICE , ( SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd HH24:MI') BETWEEN OPENTIME AND NVL(CLOSETIME,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd')||' 23:59') THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM STOREOPEN WHERE TO_CHAR(OPENTIME,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') AND S_ID = STORE.S_ID ) "OPENCHECK" FROM STORE WHERE ST_APP_STAT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI') BETWEEN ST_OPEN_TIME AND ST_CLOSE_TIME
AND S_ADD like #{sadd} || '%'
ORDER BY S_NAME DESC

SELECT RANK() OVER ( ORDER BY COUNT(O.O_NUM) DESC) RANK, S.S_NAME , S.S_ID , S.ST_DELI_SERVICE , ( SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd HH24:MI') BETWEEN OPENTIME AND NVL(CLOSETIME,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd')||' 23:59') THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM STOREOPEN WHERE TO_CHAR(OPENTIME,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') AND S_ID = S.S_ID ) "OPENCHECK" FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_DETAILS ORD ON O.O_NUM = ORD.O_NUM JOIN STORE S ON O.S_ID = S.S_ID WHERE O.C_ID = #{cId} GROUP BY S.S_NAME , S.S_ID , S.ST_DELI_SERVICE
SELECT S_ID ,S_NAME ,S_ADD ,S_TEL ,ST_DELI_SERVICE ,ST_OPEN_TIME ,ST_CLOSE_TIME , ST_MILE_SERVICE FROM STORE WHERE S_ID = #{sid}
SELECT M_NUM , M_NAME , M_PRICE , CA_NUM , M_STAT , MENUSALE , UPLOADFILE FROM MENU WHERE S_ID = #{sId} AND MENUSALE = 'Y' ORDER BY CA_NUM
SELECT M_NUM , OP_NAME , ST_NUM ,OP_PRICE , CA_NUM FROM RECIPE WHERE M_NUM=#{mNum} AND CA_NUM IN ('CAOP','CAIC','CAHT') AND S_ID= #{sId}
SELECT M_NUM , M_NAME , M_PRICE , S_ID , CA_NUM , M_STAT , MENUSALE , UPLOADFILE FROM MENU WHERE M_NUM= #{mNum} AND S_ID= #{sId}
SELECT count(*) FROM STORE WHERE S_ID= #{sId} AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24') BETWEEN SUBSTR(ST_OPEN_TIME,1,2)+1 AND SUBSTR(ST_CLOSE_TIME,1,2)-2
